component.name: FFaudiocue
component.summary: A simple graphical user interface to extracts audio tracks from audio CD images supplied with a CUE sheet.

description.p: FFaudiocue is a cross-platform GUI written in wxPython Phoenix. It is based on the FFcuesplitter library, which is based on FFmpeg for audio track extraction and encoding processes.

It features editable tags per track, an audio CD properties viewer, support for WAV, FLAC, MP3, OGG, OPUS output formats, audio compression selectors and the ability to copy audio codec without re-encoding.
